lines.text: I'm... not sure I <c=#FF00FF>have the evidence</c> I need to crack this one.
I should keep looking around the room. There should be something else I <c=#FF00FF>wasn't allowed to touch</c> before.
If I want to directly contradict the explanation we came up with, using some <c=#FF00FF>new evidence...</c>
Well, I'd need to show that something <c=#FF00FF>couldn't happen</c> that we thought happened.
I'd bet anything it has something to do with the rules of the magic involved here.
What magic got used? All three Stop spells, and one attempt at <c=#FF6000>Emergency Exit.</c>
I bet there's some reason one or more of those <c=#FF00FF>wouldn't work.</c>
